name: Toilet Paper Rush
description:
The end is near, get as much paper as you can!

Your goal is to survive in a supermarket, always having toilet papers in your hands.

As you move, you will leave behind a trail of paper.

If you step into toilet paper with the same color than the paper in your hands you will lose.

Dodge enemies and obstacles!

CONTROLS: 
WASD -> Move
Space -> Change paper on hand

Good Luck!

Recomended esolution: 1024 x 768
